verses.name: Psalms 113:1
verses.text: Praise ye the Lord. Praise, O ye servants of the Lord, praise the name of the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 113:2
verses.text: Blessed be the name of the Lord from this time forth and for evermore.

verses.name: Psalms 113:3
verses.text: From the rising of the sun unto the going down of the same the Lord’s name is to be praised.

verses.name: Psalms 113:4
verses.text: The Lord is high above all nations, and his glory above the heavens.

verses.name: Psalms 113:5
verses.text: Who is like unto the Lord our God, who dwelleth on high,

verses.name: Psalms 113:6
verses.text: Who humbleth himself to behold the things that are in heaven, and in the earth!

verses.name: Psalms 113:7
verses.text: He raiseth up the poor out of the dust, and lifteth the needy out of the dunghill;

verses.name: Psalms 113:8
verses.text: That he may set him with princes, even with the princes of his people.

verses.name: Psalms 113:9
verses.text: He maketh the barren woman to keep house, and to be a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the Lord.
